title: Can i join a ranked team S6
body: Hi My ign is hackerPro Please Add me im looking for a team to join in. I main Support {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:25}}  {{champion:117}} And I can Top also :) {{champion:36}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:62}} .Im Unranked right now but in s5 i was in silver 4 :) Please Invite me To A Rank Team :)
